entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
